revised_title: Botanical and Zoological Discoveries in Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez
tldr: The author presents an account of the petrological, botanical, and zoological collections made during the Transit of Venus Expeditions in Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez. The article focuses on the Lichen flora of Kerguelen Island, detailing the collection, identification, and classification of 61 species and 10 varieties of lichens found in the region.
